law.catch_line: Acceptance of donations -- Trust and agency fund.
law.text: The cabinet may accept donations of money, equipment, supplies, materials, and services from any person for accomplishing the purposes of KRS 211.861 to 211.869. Any donation of money shall be deposited into the State Treasury and credited to a trust and agency fund to be used by the cabinet in carrying out the provisions of KRS 211.861 to 211.869 and shall be expended by the cabinet only in accordance with the purposes of the donation.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1998.
